body.name: Kitsch Smooth Shave Butter - Smoothing Shave Butter for Sensitive Skin | Made in US | Hydrating Clear Non Clog Formula | For All Skin Types | Solid Shaving Butter | Sulfate Free & Paraben Free, 4 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 23 mins
features: HYDRATE & NOURISH YOUR SKIN: The formula of Kitsch Shave Butter is rich in hydrating and nourishing ingredients that help to keep the skin smooth and soft. It provides the skin with the moisture it needs to avoid the discomfort and redness associated with traditional shaving methods.

CLEAN AND NO RESIDUE: This smooth shaving butter's formula is designed to be "clear," meaning it won't clog your razor or leave a residue on your skin. This helps to ensure a smooth and close shave, without any interference from the product.

FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: This smoothing shave butter is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The gentle formula is free from harsh ingredients that could irritate the skin, making it an excellent choice for those with delicate skin.

GET THE FULL EXPERIENCE WITH KITSCH SAFETY RAZOR: This smooth shaving butter is specially formulated to work best with Kitsch Perfect Glide Safety Razor. When used together, the combination provides an optimal shaving experience that leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth.

ECO-FRIENDLY: Kitsch Shave Butter is Paraben, phthalate, silicone, sulfate, and fragrance-free and is designed to reduce single-use plastic waste. The product is packaged in a recyclable container, helping to reduce the impact of shaving on the environment.
body.description: "The key to smooth shave. Get ready for the ultimate shaving experience with Kitsch Shave Butter! Our hydrating and nourishing formula is designed to leave your skin feeling smooth and soft after every shave. With its ""clear,"" non-clogging formula, you can say goodbye to the redness and discomfort associated with traditional shaving methods. And the best part? Our product is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Our formula is free from harmful ingredients like parabens, phthalates, silicones, sulfates, and fragrances, making it the perfect choice for those with delicate skin. For the best results, use our Kitsch Shave Butter with our Kitsch Perfect Glide Safety Razor. Do your part in reducing single-use plastic waste with our product. Our packaging is recyclable, making it an environmentally conscious choice. Upgrade your shaving routine with Kitsch Shave Butter today! Add to cart NOW! "

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kitsch Smooth Shave Butter: A Luxurious Shaving Experience
reviews.reviewText: The Kitsch Smooth Shave Butter has redefined my shaving routine, elevating it from a mundane task to a luxurious and pampering experience. As someone who values a smooth and irritation-free shave, this product has quickly become a staple in my grooming regimen, and here's why.First and foremost, the texture of the shave butter is simply divine. Its rich and creamy consistency glides effortlessly onto the skin, creating a silky-smooth surface for the razor. The buttery formula is not only indulgent but also incredibly effective in providing a close and comfortable shave without the fear of nicks or irritation.The scent of the Kitsch Smooth Shave Butter is a delightful addition to the overall experience. The subtle and refreshing fragrance adds a touch of sophistication to the shaving routine, making it a sensory delight. It's not overpowering but leaves a subtle hint that lingers pleasantly, creating a spa-like ambiance in the comfort of my own bathroom.What truly sets this shave butter apart is its moisturizing properties. The nourishing ingredients, including shea butter and aloe vera, work in harmony to hydrate and soothe the skin. After each shave, my skin feels remarkably soft and moisturized, eliminating the need for an additional post-shave lotion. This feature is especially appreciated during colder months when my skin tends to be more prone to dryness.The Kitsch Smooth Shave Butter has exceeded my expectations in delivering a shaving experience that combines luxury, effectiveness, and skincare benefits. It has become a must-have in my grooming routine, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking a shaving product that goes beyond the ordinary. Treat yourself to the indulgence of Kitsch and transform your daily shave into a moment of self-care and bliss. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This bar is amazing!!! You need it.
reviews.reviewText: I was starting to get some razor burn when shaving my armpits and was thinking I needed to replace the razor head. In the meantime, I ordered this because it was about the same price as the shaving cream I had been using and this product is equivalent to 2 cans- so why not try it out. I didn’t even replace my razor when I tried this product out and no more razor burn!!! And I’ve noticed less overall irritation and fewer ingrown hairs. It’s been almost 2 months now and I’m still getting great results- without having to change my razor blade. So, basically, you’re potentially saving on two fronts: shaving cream/whatever you’re currently using to shave, AND on new razors. I tell everyone about this Shave Butter Bar. I even want to try out their other bars because this is so great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slick and Moisturizing!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for shaving while travelling. I didn't want to have to deal with the fuss of a mini shaving cream can or anything liquid so it brought me to this lovely solid bar. The scent is light and pleasant. It travels okayish, it'll get a soggy if left in a wet environment where it cannot dry properly so be careful. It also clogs up some razors (I was using the billie one with it and sometimes the shaving soap kind of overloaded it, but it has no problems with my safety razor). All that to say I actually do like this shaving soap! It provides great protection for shaving AND leaves my skin feeling soft/moisturized afterwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing. I get razor burn with everything I use. I tried this product and just wow. No razor burn. My private area was smooth and irritation free. I will buy this in bulk now. Amazing product. Please give it a try. You will not be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This bar is very smooth and has a nice lather. I definitely have been able to apply lotion less often. I was pleasantly surprised that the scent is very light, kind of reminds me of a jasmine tea. I can't use many scented things as I have a fragrance sensitivity for skin and nose. This was not irritating at all to either skin or nose. Scent washes off well and does not linger. Definitely helps with skin with razor burn tendencies. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dissolves and Sticks
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this product because in theory is is great: hydrating, eco friendly, lasts longer than shaving cream, great sent, etc. BUT after a few uses, it starts to dissolve and stick to whatever you place it on. Towards the end it didn't hold its shape and would break apart if you apply too much pressure to it, which you need in order to get a good lather. I was very disappointed.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything is claims and more!
reviews.reviewText: This soap is the bomb! It has a pleasant smell but most importantly it's so easy to use. I was skeptical so I did trial with shave gel on one leg and this soap on the other. Not only did that leg stay smoother longer (no hair) my leg was softer and more moisturized. I love this soap. I would not change anything about it. I will only be using this soap from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute game changer! Buy it NOW!
reviews.reviewText: This shave bar is a complete game changer!! Rich luxurious lather with the most heavenly scent! My skin is always so soft and much more nourished!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this bar except the shape. It works brilliantly, lovely smooth finish but it’s quite a large square bar and it is difficult to hold (I shave in the shower) so I cut it in half! Now it’s easier to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not had a chance to try as yet smells lovely. Only thing I was surprised at box for soap was open and bashed and top of soap bar crumbling
